mapper.insert: insert into t_sysresource (name, url,perm, pid, sysresourcetype_id, iconcls, remark, seq) values (#{name}, #{url},#{perm}, #{pid}, #{sysResourceTypeId}, #{iconCls}, #{remark}, #{seq})
mapper.update: update t_sysresource set name = #{name}, url = #{url}, perm = #{perm}, pid = #{pid}, sysresourcetype_id = #{sysResourceTypeId}, iconcls = #{iconCls}, remark = #{remark}, seq = #{seq} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select distinct id, name, url,perm, pid, sysresourcetype_id, iconcls, remark, seq from t_sysresource resource left join t_sysresource_sysrole resourcerole on resource.id = resourcerole.sysresource_id left join t_sysrole_sysuser roleuser on roleuser.sysrole_id = resourcerole.sysrole_id where roleuser.sysuser_id = #{userId} and resource.sysresourcetype_id = #{sysresourcetype} order by seq
